publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-4064 Ms Margaret Curran: Closing the Opportunity Gap for Older People-That the Parliament welcomes the Scottish Executive's commitment to close the opportunity gap for Scotland's older people by building first-class public services and developing initiatives in health, transport and other priority areas, which will support older people in living healthy, active and independent lives. Supported by: Lewis Macdonald*, Des McNulty*
